code: var key="rQTX6ScmQjCQOMr1xm1FBbMSTHRKO1MC";var fromApiResponse=function fromApiResponse(apiResponse){var data=apiResponse.data;var images=data.images,title=data.title,id=data.id;var url=images.downsized_medium.url;return{title:title,id:id,url:url};};export default function getSingleGif(_ref){var gif_id=_ref.gif_id;return fetch("https://api.giphy.com/v1/gifs/".concat(gif_id,"?api_key=").concat(key)).then(function(ans){return ans.json();}).then(fromApiResponse);}
